page.title: 18Buildings-Bolton by Bowland
page.content: All the buildings are grey stone and painted black and white.There have been no new buildings, apart from the village hall twenty years ago, since the 1930's although a lot of houses have been converted and adapted.One row of houses in Bolton by Bowland is more than 290 years old. The{Court House,}which was once the court for the whole of Bowland area,has a very large fireplace with a coat of arms above it.It is now a private house. {Stocks House,}which is next to the village stocks,was built in 1880 and has been used for lots of things in the past,a reading room, a bakery,a coffee house and a police station. An old barn in the village was once a coach house but it is being converted into a house.
